title: Jordan Peterson and Tim Keller raid Atheism's Nominal Mushy Middle
description:
The dynamics in the US church are different from Noel Plum's UK. The rise of progressive liberationism is destroying the nominal and leaving the devout exposed. Into this gap comes Jordan Peterson and Tim Keller. Other elements from Robert Putnam and Dallas Willard. 

Noel Plum part 1 https://youtu.be/h1rQXjqJ_mQ
Atheist Preacher video https://youtu.be/klYUhyB3W7g

Adam's Think Club Video https://youtu.be/5jJU9Otkoso
Dallas Willard Veritas Forum https://youtu.be/X6hwsG7AUZ0
Gay Roman Emperor Genes https://www.patheos.com/blogs/catholicauthenticity/2015/07/the-gay-roman-emperor-gene/
George Marsden Soul University https://www.amazon.com/Soul-American-University-Establishment-Established/dp/B001TP3TX0
Tim Keller Faith Angle Forum https://faithangle.org/session/conservative-christianity-christian-right/
Tim Keller Big Think https://youtu.be/FJO4aYoaleg
Richard Dawkins on Unbelievable https://youtu.be/p5_0Fx_RICI

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate 
Donations may be tax deductible for taxpayers of the United States
